group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*

group_1.textCenter: We didn't have to come if we didn't want to, but...

group_1.textLeft: But there's no other way to spend the night at@the beach.

group_1.textRight: Well, as long as you finish studying, you'll be fine,@and we can play around during breaks.
That's right! Don't go complaining about it!

group_1.textLeft: Let me guess, this was all your fault, wasn't it?!
You didn't want to do your homework because@you were too lazy about it,
so Yachiyo had to plan this study camp.

group_1.textRight: Don't blame it on me!
I said I didn't want to do it! I said it loud and@clear!

group_1.textLeft: You never want to do it.
Well, the idea of planning a study camp may@sound like an ordeal,
but I just asked Touka to let me borrow one of@her family's lodges.
I figured a change of environment would make it@easier for us to concentrate on our studies.

group_1.textRight: It's a good thing you don't have any homework@to do.

group_1.textLeft: I've got reports to write too, you know...

group_1.textRight: I'm gonna do mine when I get home. Right now@I want to play in the ocean... [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]I can't?

group_1.textLeft: If it was just you here, Tsuruno, then that'd@be okay, but this is for everyone's sake.

group_1.textRight: Ugh...I know, I know...
I'm so excited to be able to sleep over with you@guys!

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad to hear you say that.
We usually live together, so it's pretty rare that@we can all go out for a sleepover.
This is kind of exciting.

group_1.textRight: Yes...!

group_1.textCenter: The camp is only three days long.
Each student must do ten pages of their@textbooks every day for each subject.

group_1.textRight: You can't do that to us!
Yeah! I want to go to the beach and relax!

group_1.textLeft: I've already heard it all from the both of you.
Well, if you can focus on your homework every day,@you can go to the beach, at least for a little while.
Even though it's study camp, I don't want to@keep you cooped up.
Wait, wait, wait! So that means you're the only@one who can play?!
This is unbelievable!

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* I was all set to have fun in the ocean, but...

group_1.textLeft: We're so close to the beach. I'm not gonna put@up with this...!

group_1.textRight: ...Yachiyo!
If we can hit our entire quota for all subjects in@one day...
Allow us to play on the beach tomorrow!

group_1.textLeft: Well...that's fine, but can you really do it?

group_1.textRight: I will!
Yeah, I'll try...!

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case, I'm raring to go all of a sudden!@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Yep, yep!

group_1.textRight: Well, it's better than being locked up for three@days...

group_1.textLeft: We'll do our best, too.

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textLeft: Ask me anything you don't understand, Ui.

group_1.textRight: Thanks, Sana!
It'll be a bit of a pain to do all the subjects in@one day.
But I've been chipping away at my homework,@so that'll be a manageable amount, at least.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, Momoko...you've been doing your@homework?

group_1.textRight: Maybe a little.
I did, too.

group_1.textLeft: Am I the only one who hasn't done her@homework?

group_1.textCenter: I'll start by opening the textbook!

group_1.textLeft: Oh...well, she hasn't either...
